item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) – March 2022 update
item.description: Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) March 2022 update is out with a summary of the latest guidance, samples, and solutions from Microsoft or from the community for the community. This article is a summary of all the different areas and topics around the community work we do around Microsoft 365 ecosystem during the past month. Thank you for being part of this success.
